attributes.action: Introduce a fire break lockdown for 2 weeks to stop the spread of covid19
attributes.additional_details:
The covid 19 virus continues to spread and the prime minister constantly has new ideas. Recently there are now covid tiers for local areas but despite this infections are growing and deaths are reaching their highest. My family all suffered covid and some still have long covid 3 months on. We need to stop this disease spreading and lockdown and enforce the rules more. Before it’s to late !
Just remember behind each death is the story of a loved one passing away. It’s horrifying !
attributes.background: We need a 2 week strict fire break lockdown as Wales are doing. Non essential shops, gyms and hospitality to close only for 2 weeks. It will slow the infection rate and we can use this time to fix any issues with test and trace.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown, from 5 November to 2 December: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/new-national-restrictions-from-5-november
